page.title: 05WATER SPORTS ON THE DEE
page.content: The river hosts many sports, as it is quite broad and travels very slowly. This is because of the famous weir by the old Dee Bridge. These include canoeing, windsurfing, sailing and rowing.There is a canoeing club and a sailing club.Rowing is by far the most popular sport, there being 5 clubs. Grosvenor;the largest private club. Kings school;a rich public school club for boys. Athena;a girls' public school club sharing a boathouse with Kings. Royal Chester;a succesful private club {Queens Park High School; }a comprehensive school club,though relying almost totally upon fundraising by its members.
